questions.question: What is the dominant color of the main body of the product?
What is the primary material appearing to constitute the main body?
What is the overall shape of the product's main component?

What color is the topmost cap or cover of the product?
How many visible ports or openings are located on the base?
What appears to be the function suggested by the two openings?

What is the general design style of the product; minimalist or ornate?

What is the apparent shape of the charging ports on the base?
Does the product seem to consist primarily of one or multiple pieces?

What is the color of the visible connector ports on the base?
Is the translucent body section uniformly colored or does it show variations?
